entity.name: GoalPost Project
entity.description: GoalPost is an open-source, privacy-centered platform that supports mutual aid groups, worker cooperatives, and communities of care in coordinating with trust, consent, and dignity. We empower small, trust-based groups to map goals, resources, and mutual support networks without relying on extractive corporate technology.

projects.name: GoalPost
projects.description: GoalPost helps communities of care coordinate mutual support, goals, and resources through relational, privacy-first digital infrastructure.

channels.description: Support GoalPost development through Open Collective.

plans.name: Core Development Fund
plans.description: Support ongoing open-source development, privacy-first infrastructure, and community training.
